content:
Currently we have the following problems:

  • if the issue is closed without removing the label, there is no update here, so we might end up discussing a closed issue if we haven't clicked on the link yet.
  • Removing the label when the issue is closed has no effect. You need to add the label again, and remove it for it to emit the "prioritisation is removed" message here (unless this is a false positive which i need to test) (works as intended)
okay i just tested it with #73130 and the second part works as intended so not an issue
